      • onTooltip

        public java.lang.String onTooltip(Player commander,
                                  Command c)
        Specified by:
        onTooltip in interface CommandListener
        Parameters:
        commander - The Player requesting the Commands tool-tip description.
        c - The Command issued.
        Returns:
        Returns a String tool-tip description. If the Player is not permitted to use the Command issued, then null should be returned.

      • getPermissionNode

        public java.lang.String getPermissionNode(java.lang.String command)
        Specified by:
        getPermissionNode in interface CommandListener
        Parameters:
        command - The String command to resolve.
        Returns:
        Returns a resolved String permission-node for the String command given.
